fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Wheezing, shortness of breath, chest tightness, and coughing.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Family history of asthma or allergies, environmental factors.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Audible wheezing, reduced airflow on expiration.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoidance of triggers, regular follow-up, action plan for exacerbations
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Monitor peak flow, adjust therapy as needed
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Persistent cough, sputum production, shortness of breath, and wheezing.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Long-term smoking, exposure to lung irritants.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Progressive disease affecting lung airflow and air sacs.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Reduced breath sounds, prolonged expiration, wheezes or crackles.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Regular spirometry, manage exacerbations, assess for oxygen need
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Progressive shortness of breath, dry cough.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Unknown cause; risk factors include smoking, environmental exposures.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Scarring of the lung tissue, affecting the ability to breathe.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Antifibrotic agents, lung transplantation in severe cases
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Pulmonary rehabilitation, oxygen therapy, symptom management
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Monitor lung function, manage comorbidities, supportive care
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Persistent cough, weight loss, haemoptysis, chest pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Smoking, exposure to radon gas, asbestos.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Malignant tumour growth in the lung tissue.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Regular imaging studies, manage side effects, palliative care
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fever, cough with phlegm, shortness of breath, chest pain when breathing or coughing.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Infection that inflames air sacs in one or both lungs.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Crackles and/or consolidation on lung auscultation.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Ensure complete course of antibiotics, follow-up chest X-ray
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Assess for resolution of symptoms, vaccination for prevention
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Persistent cough, weight loss, night sweats, fever.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Exposure to TB bacteria, living or traveling to high-prevalence areas.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A bacterial infection affecting the lungs, potentially other parts of the body.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Directly observed therapy (DOT), monitoring for drug resistance
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up, chest X-rays to monitor progress
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Cough, production of mucus, fatigue, mild headache, shortness of breath.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Viral infections, exposure to tobacco smoke or pollutants.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Wheezing and rhonchi, normal oxygen saturation.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoidance of smoke and pollutants, use of humidifier
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Ensure resolution of symptoms, consider vaccination
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Persistent cough with thick mucus, frequent lung infections, shortness of breath.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Genetic disorder affecting the lungs, pancreas, and other organs.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Affects the cells that produce mucus, sweat, and digestive juices.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Nutritional support, monitoring lung function, managing diabetes
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Loud snoring, observed episodes of stopped breathing during sleep, excessive daytime sleepiness.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Obesity, family history, use of alcohol or sedatives.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A disorder in which breathing repeatedly stops and starts during sleep.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Enlarged tonsils or soft palate, obesity.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: CPAP therapy, weight loss, possibly surgery
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Lifestyle changes, avoid alcohol before sleep, CPAP adherence
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up, monitor for cardiovascular disease
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fatigue, persistent dry cough, skin lesions, shortness of breath.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Unknown causes; possible immune response to unknown substances.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Growth of tiny inflammatory cells in various parts of the body.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Assess for organ involvement, regular follow-up visits
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Sudden shortness of breath, chest pain, cough, sometimes with blood.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: History of deep vein thrombosis, prolonged immobility, surgery.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A blood clot that has traveled to the lungs.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tachypnea, tachycardia, signs of DVT in lower extremities.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Anticoagulant therapy, thrombolytic therapy in severe cases
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Preventive measures for DVT, long-term anticoagulation
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Monitor for recurrent DVT/PE, manage risk factors
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Shortness of breath during routine activities, fatigue, chest pain, edema.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can result from a variety of underlying disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: High blood pressure in the arteries to the lungs.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Accentuated pulmonary component of the second heart sound, jugular venous distension.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Manage underlying cause, supportive care for symptoms
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Regular echocardiograms, assess response to treatment
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Progressive shortness of breath, dry cough.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Exposure to hazardous materials, autoimmune disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A group of disorders that cause scarring of lung tissues.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Fine crackles at lung bases, clubbing of fingers.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Monitor lung function, manage oxygen needs
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Chest pain, shortness of breath, weight loss.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A rare cancer of the mesothelium, often the pleura.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Possible pleural effusion noted on exam.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Lung cancer, pleural effusion of other causes
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Manage symptoms, palliative care for advanced disease
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up, manage pain and breathing difficulty
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Chronic cough with daily production of mucus, frequent lung infections, shortness of breath.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can result from an infection or disease that injures the airway walls.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Permanent enlargement of parts of the airways of the lung.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Antibiotics for infections, airway clearance therapies
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Vaccinations to prevent infections, pulmonary rehabilitation
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Monitor for exacerbations, assess lung function regularly
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Exposure to viral or bacterial pathogens, smoking, chronic lung disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Infections affecting the airways below the larynx, including bronchitis and pneumonia.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Reduced breath sounds, crackles, wheezing, or rhonchi on auscultation.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Antibiotics for bacterial infections, supportive care for viral infections
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Hydration, rest, monitoring of symptoms, inhalation therapy if indicated
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Follow-up to ensure resolution of infection, vaccination recommendations
fields.label: Accurex Message
